thread.title: Roads: A55, Anglesey
thread.title_full: Roads: A55, Anglesey | Wales - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Roads: A55, Anglesey
text:
The A55 is closed in both directions and there's queueing traffic after two accidents between J3 Valley and J4 Llanfihangel.
Credit: traffic-wales.com NWPControlroom @NWPControlroom Follow A collision on the A55, Caergeiliog J3, means the road will be closed in both directions for some time.
08:53 - 15 Oct 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Last updated Thu 15 Oct 2015 Read more 3 updates Crashes close A55 in north Wales Travel North Wales Anglesey A55 Wales
